reviewText: Doesn't play in US DVD players

Love this dvd, love this band! I flew all the way from Chicago to England to see them live for the first time in my life for this tour...it was worth every single penny I spent! Having the dvd keeps it all fresh in my mind! Spandau Ballet just played here in Chicago a couple of weeks ago, I wish I could have a dvd of that gig! This dvd is worth the price but, FANS IN THE USA....THIS IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH YOUR US DVD PLAYER! Get an all region player, it's worth it!
Item is not viewable in USA! Does not play on US format DVD players.
Wasn"t able to play in the States. Cost more to ship it back than what it cost. Still waiting for refund!
